column1: - PETG CF: Will be used for high stesss components such as wheel connectors
- ESC: Used to control the brushless motor.
- m3 and m4 screws. Will be used to put everything together.
- 3s Lipo: Main power source of the car
These are the main components I need for the RC Car.
In Detail Description (all prices in CAD):
- RC Tires for 1/10 scale model RC Car
- 3s Lipo 11.2v 2200MAH Lipo Battery 100C for RC vehicles
- m3 m4 m5 m6 screw set
